Tenggat Kasus Novel Kok Mundur Pak Jokowi?
02 Nov 2019, 05:51 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Penantian akan kejelasan teror penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel Baswedan akan lebih lama lagi. Musababnya, Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) memberikan tenggat tim teknis Polri hingga awal Desember nanti.
"Saya beri waktu sampai awal Desember. Saya sampaikan awal Desember," ujar Jokowi di kompleks Istana Kepresidenan Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Arahan Jokowi itu disampaikannya pada Jenderal Idham Azis yang baru saja dilantik menjadi Kapolri yang baru menggantikan Tito Karnavian. Sebenarnya tim teknis itu sudah diberi waktu yang cukup oleh Jokowi yaitu 3 bulan lamanya dari 3 Agustus 2019 hingga 31 Oktober 2019 tetapi tidak ada perkembangan apapun yang disampaikan ke publik dengan alasan kerahasiaan.
Di sisi lain Polri melalui Kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Irjen M Iqbal menyampaikan bila tim itu masih bekerja. Dia turut menyampaikan bila ada perkembangan signifikan dari kasus itu.
"Doakan saja insyaallah kalau Tuhan rida. Kami akan segera mengungkap kasus ini," kata Iqbal.

The deadline for the Novel Case, why is Pak Jokowi stepping down?
02 Nov 2019, 05:51 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The wait for clarity on the terror of the hard watering of the Baswedan novel will be even longer. The cause, President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) gave the deadline for the Polri technical team until early December.
"I give time until early December. I convey the beginning of December," said Jokowi in the Jakarta Presidential Palace complex, Friday (11/01/2019).
Jokowi's direction was conveyed to General Idham Azis who had just been appointed as the new National Police Chief to replace Tito Karnavian. Actually the technical team has been given enough time by Jokowi, which is 3 months from 3 August 2019 to 31 October 2019, but no developments have been made public regarding reasons of confidentiality.
On the other hand, the National Police through the Head of the Public Relations Division, Inspector General Iqbal, said that the team was still working. He also said that there had been significant developments in the case.
"Just pray, God willing, God is happy. We will soon reveal this case," said Iqbal.
